ygData.subject: NEWBIE NEEDS ANSWERS
ygData.msgSnippet: hail and well met! I started a a necromancer and am L2 now (darkelf).   Just got bound at Greater Fay-Lesser Fay zone entrance.  I have some questions I was
ygData.messageBody:
hail and well met!

I started a a necromancer and am L2 now (darkelf). Just got bound at
Greater Fay-Lesser Fay zone entrance. I have some questions I was hoping
any of you could answer .. . any help would be very nice! :-)

1) What can I do in Steamfont or Lesser Fay or Greater Fay that will improve
my faction w/ Gnomes,Dwarves and or HighElves . ..

2) Will killing skeletons hurt my faction w/ necro guild??? Someone told me
it would.

3) Can Necromancers were better than Cloth armor? I saw a post that said
someone had on wolf pelt armor . . .

4) What % of the Experience is taken if I ever summon a Skkeleton to help
me. (I don't have the summon pet spell yet :-( Is it an even share? or a
%?? and does it come from my split or everyones????


Thanks any help would be great! :-)

-Skel the Dark Elf Necromancer.
